downloadTitle: Microsoft Office Project Portfolio Server 2007 Migration Guide
downloadDescription: This document will help you understand the approaches for migrating from Microsoft Office Project Portfolio Server 2007 to Microsoft Project Server 2010.
detailsSection:
This document is intended for for both IT professionals and business users that use Microsoft Office Project Portfolio Server 2007 today and are considering an upgrade to Microsoft Project Server 2010. This document outlines the various approaches and points out the useful resources in this area.

For more Upgrade and Migration resources to Project 2010, please visit our dedicated Project 2010 Upgrade nad Migration Center on Microsoft TechNet - http://go.microsoft.com/?linkid=9676814.

For all other information about Microsoft Project 2010 - please visit http://www.microsoft.com/project.
systemRequirementsSection: To download and read this paper, you must have XPS Viewer or Adobe Reader.
installInstructionSection: Click Download, and then save the file to your computer. Open the file in the appropriate viewer to read and print it.
